description.de: Kontaktieren Sie große Nachrichtenagenturen wie AP, um die Iran-Berichterstattung zu verbreiten.
description.fr: Contactez les grandes agences de presse comme AP pour diffuser la couverture de la crise en Iran.

template.subject: Iran Crisis: Request for Wire Service Coverage
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am reaching out to request comprehensive wire service coverage of the ongoing crisis in Iran.

As you may be aware, since December 28, 2025:

• Over 51 protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
• More than 2,270 people have been arbitrarily detained
• A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
• Security forces have used live ammunition against peaceful demonstrators

Wire service coverage is crucial because:

1. Your stories reach thousands of newspapers and broadcasters globally
2. Many smaller outlets rely on wire services for international coverage
3. Your credibility lends authority to the reporting
4. Continuous updates keep the story in the news cycle

I urge you to dedicate resources to this developing situation. The Iranian people need sustained international attention.

Thank you for your vital role in informing the world.

Sincerely,
A concerned citizen from {{senderCountry}}

variations.subject: Request: Sustained AP Coverage of Iran Protests
variations.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

As a citizen of {{senderCountry}}, I'm writing to encourage continued wire service coverage of the Iran crisis.

Current situation:
• 51+ killed since December 28, 2025
• 2,270+ detained
• Complete internet blackout
• Lethal force against civilians

Wire services like yours amplify stories globally. Thousands of outlets depend on your reporting. Please continue covering this important story.

Thank you for your essential work.

Respectfully,
A concerned reader
